job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtSmith Hanley AssociatesltpgtltpgtMachine Learning EngineerltpgtltpgtAustin TX arealtpgtltpgtBase salary 60000  80000 depending on experienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtLeading edge company is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to develop data sets and build and test models The role will involve procuring and cleaning data from a variety of sources including from sensors labs modeling software and more You will prototype algorithms evaluate neural networks for computer vision tasks debug scripts assist in software development utilizing python and C produce research and present work Use your deep experience in data modeling and analysis in this challenging and high visibility roleampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtNote No visas or OPT candidates will be processed at this timeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequirements of the Machine Learning EngineerltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtProficiency with multiple machine learning techniques including deep learning kmeans clustering Bayesian classifiers and treebased modelsltpgtltpgtProficiency using Python C MatlabltpgtltpgtExperience using Tensorflow or PyTorch to train and tune machine learning modelsltpgtltpgtExperience producing production quality codeltpgtltpgtExpertise with linear systems graph theory probability and statisticsltpgtltpgtMinimum 12 years of solid experience in a professional environmentltpgtltpgtMinimum Bachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering Statistics Mathematics or other quantitative discipline Masters degree preferredltpgtltpgtAbility to work with a variety of platformsampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf this job isnt for you see our other open positions at wwwjobssmithhanleycomampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSmith Hanley Associates takes pride in being the premier recruiting agency serving the marketing analytics industry For more information please visit our website at wwwsmithhanleycomltpgt
